name: Quadrra Premium Upholstered Bed with Box Storage and Grid-Tufted Headboard (King Size, Jade ivory)
description:
The Jade Ivory variant of the Quadrra Premium Upholstered Bed is all about understated elegance. Its serene, creamy hue lends itself beautifully to both light and dark room schemes, adding a fresh, airy vibe. The grid-tufted headboard serves both decorative and functional purposes, giving you a supportive backrest while enhancing the overall sophistication of the room.

Functionality meets style with the box storage unit, which spans the entire under-bed area and offers a practical solution to space limitations. Whether for extra pillows or off-season items, this storage keeps your bedroom neat and organized.

The internal frame structure includes a reinforced wooden grid supported by a center leg, ensuring the mattress stays flat and well-supported. This setup reduces motion transfer and increases longevity, making it a wise investment for your sleep quality.

With its smooth upholstery, soft edges, and solid construction, the Quadrra Premium Bed in Jade Ivory is perfect for those who value clean aesthetics, comfort, and utility—all rolled into one premium bedroom essential.

Key Features:


	
	King Size Dimensions: Provides a spacious and comfortable sleeping area for couples or individuals who prefer extra room.
	
	
	Jade Ivory Upholstery: A soft, neutral tone that brightens up interiors and effortlessly complements any décor style.
	
	
	Grid-Tufted Headboard: Accentuated with square tufting for a refined and structured look.
	
	
	Ample Box Storage: Hidden under-bed storage perfect for storing linens, blankets, or seasonal clothing.
	
	
	Robust Wooden Frame: Sturdy cross-braced wooden base with a center support leg for long-term durability.
	
	
	Padded Surrounds: Fully upholstered and softly padded side rails for safety and a premium finish.
	
	
	Elegant Fabric Finish: Smooth textured fabric that is gentle to touch and easy to maintain.
	
	
	Versatile Aesthetic: Ideal for minimalistic, Scandinavian, or classic interiors due to its light and neutral color palette.
